text: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ

translation.en.sahih: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan berkeliling di sekitar mereka anak-anak muda untuk (melayani) mereka, seakan-akan mereka itu mutiara yang tersimpan.
